?

I think the convention for moving a player to X,Y is

For the last bit I assume you changed the pricing integer in prices.txt but you didn’t to change it in item.cfg or vice versa.

item.title: 3 things [pi]
item.dc:creator: @chaosplaya09 chaosplaya09
item.description:
@chaosplaya09 wrote:

3 THINGS [PI]

Dclaws Special Not Showing
LITERALLY NOT SHOWING AT ALL… I FOLLOWED EVERY TUT I COULD FIND IN THE GOOGLE SEARCH…

Donor Tele
so all i need is the command with this in it.

if (c.playerRights = 4)) {
(x tele)
(y tele)
} else {
c.sendMessage(“YOU NEED TO BE A DONATOR TO USE THIS COMMAND!”);
}

Shop Not Telling You How Much You Buy An Item For
I click on the item but it shows as 0 coins… but when i click buy 1 it takes 200m away.
I changed the price to 200m so it would not be over priced.
BUT when i click value when i want to sell it.
It shows as 200m.

Read full topic
